list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long-bodied chiefly marine fish with a cartilaginous skeleton, a prominent dorsal fin, and toothlike scales. Most sharks are predatory, although the largest kinds feed on plankton, and some can grow to a large size.
a small Southeast Asian freshwater fish with a tail resembling that of a shark, popular in aquaria.
a light grayish-brown European moth, the male of which has pale silvery hind wings.
a person who unscrupulously exploits or swindles others.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: property sharks want to develop 200 acres around the site
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cá mập tài sản muốn phát triển 200 mẫu đất xung quanh trang web
